programme.title: DORA S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Troll Jelly / Catch That Kitty - Dora and Boots help the Grumples make troll jelly before the Grumpy Old Troll's snack time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Granola Bars / Nachos - When Morton the Butterfly's travel snack crash lands on the Stump, Chef and Olly compete to make him the best snack for his journey.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Join In - The Teletubbies have their favourite things and The Noo-Noo wants to join in. When the Tubby Phone rings, the Teletubbies and The Noo-Noo do the Tubby Phone Dance together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep2
programme.desc: B - Dee encourages a friend to say 'b', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some brilliant beards, blow some bubbles and meet a baboon bouncing balls!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Spin the Arrow - On today's poptastic adventure, Helping Hand has created a spectacular new game. But with Plomand Mae-Mae tied on points, who will be the winner?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Tiny Sandwiches - Messy joins Zim and his friends on a mission inside a sandwich to photograph some atoms for Mayor Oki... Everyone say cheese!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Bedroom - Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Obstacle Course - Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Shopping Shenanigans, Istanbul, Turkey - Glitch's wishes cause underground trouble in Istanbul - an ancient ceiling may collapse!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Sea Arch Escape - Xuli's flying race around the Academy inspires cadet Tala to fly the Grimbler. But she crashes into a fragile sea arch that could collapse right on top of her!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Doctor - Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo's as the other injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Calypso - At school, Bluey and her friends enjoy various games. Teacher Calypso keeps her charges on track with a wise word and a song... all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Andy and The Humpback Whale - Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to the Pacific Ocean, off the coast of Mexico. His mission, to record a male humpback whale.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Mission: Post Box - Dr Amit has a very important letter to post. But first, he and Kika need to buy a stamp at the shop in time to catch the last post.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep18
programme.desc: Proper Pirate Proficiency Test - Captain Captain is wearing her Proper Pirate Proficiency badge and Seaweed realises he doesn't have one! He discovers he will have to pass the Proper Pirate Proficiency Test or he'll have to leave.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Volcanic Island - Grandmaster Glitch is drilling near an underwater volcano in the ocean beside Academy Island in search of some hot bubbly mud.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Solar E-Glitch - After watching a solar eclipse, the team head into space to fix the biggest glitch yet!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep8
programme.desc: Batucada - While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas and Gabriela get ready for the Batucada carnival at the docks.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Cake Decorate - Cake decides to teach Sarah and Duck how to decorate with icing!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Shallot Boat - After a night of strong rain, the Shallots set sail on a seafaring adventure.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Runaway Train - Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Library Book - Stanley must track down the missing library book, 'The Little Book of New Things to Do'. He visits various townsfolk who have leant the book to each other.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Matching Socks - When Monty can't find a pair of matching socks, he begins to wonder why things have to match at all.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep6
programme.desc: It's Time to Visit the Optician - JoJo and Gran Gran take a trip to have JoJo's eyes tested at the opticians. Jaxon and Ezra help explain what it means to be long- and short-sighted.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.desc: Ragdoll - Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep47

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Solar E-Glitch - After watching a solar eclipse, the team head into space to fix the biggest glitch yet!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep8

programme.desc: Miyanaga Aiko (Contemporary artist) visits Kyoto. The Mincho font, drawn by hand in around 1990, evokes 350-year-old hand-carved woodblocks, made to print Buddhist sutras.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Ishikawa. The traditional culture of Ishikawa prefecture is reflected in its diverse arts and crafts. Join us on a design hunt in a region recovering from disaster.

programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: Enjoy a bowl of ramen to greet the New Year in the snowy mountains of Hida Takayama!

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Friedensdorf International takes sick and injured children from war zones to Germany for treatment and rehabilitation. Director Birgit Stifter explains its activities on a visit to Hiroshima.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Late Summer Fun
programme.desc: Summer is winding down, and tonight down by Edo Bay the streets are filled with professional entertainers, food sellers, and revelers. It's getting late, but this party is just getting started.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: cockroach traps & residential maps.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Andrew Dewar: A Canadian designer of paper airplanes. In a Japanophiles interview, Dewar tells Peter Barakan about his lifelong passion for paper airplanes, inspired by a Japanese master of the craft.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Origami Magic
programme.desc: Origami is magic made from a single sheet of paper. We introduce two artists who create unique paper "figures." And our origami expert "Dr. OrigamiI," will teach you how to make an easy origami craft.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: Despite the rise of transfer apps, around 100,000 timetables are printed each month. Discover the charm of Japanese train timetables as we speak to the editors and the foreign residents who use them.

programme.desc: At UFC 288, Aljamain Funkmaster Sterling defended his bantamweight belt from one of the greatest combat athletes of all time, Henry Triple C Cejudo. See both men train and prepare for their title tilt on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep708
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Fighter Focus: Diego Lopes, Unbreakable: Ignacio Bahamondes, Ultimate Access: Alexa Grasso, Origins: Paul Rosas" - Brazilian featherweight Diego Lopes shares his journey from Brazil to Mexico. Inspired by Mexico's fighting spirit, Diego has made his home in the heart of Puebla, where his team proudly calls themselves the Brazilian Warriors. Ignacio Bahamondes details the story of his unbreakable bond with his father, a South American kickboxing champion, who played a crucial role in guiding him to the pinnacle of MMA. We go behind the scenes with Alexa Grasso as she returns to Mexico City to commentate at Moreno vs Royval 2. As the UFC's youngest fighter, Raul Rosas reflects on the sacrifices his immigrant family made to provide him with the opportunity to compete at the sport's highest level.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC297StricklandvsDuPlessis
programme.desc: UFC returns to Toronto with two championship bouts. After an impressive victory over Israel Adesanya, Sean Strickland defends his middleweight belt for the first time against South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis. And in the co-main event, Raquel Pennington and Mayra Bueno Silva battle for the vacant women's bantanweight title. All this and more on Ufc Reloaded

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Dolidze 2
programme.desc: Prelims - In 2023, middleweight contenders Marvin Vettori and Roman Dolidze battled it out for three rounds, with Italys Vettori taking a hard-fought decision. On March 15, they will run it back at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas in a UFC Fight Night main event rematch that will give them five rounds to settle their business. Georgias Dolidze is coming off the best year of his career in 2024, as he defeated Anthony Smith and Kevin Holland, putting him in prime form as he attempts to solve the puzzle presented by the veteran Vettori

programme.title: UFC 313: Pereira vs. Ankalaev
programme.desc: Prelims - After a historic 2024 campaign that saw him step into the Octagon three times in defense of his UFC light heavyweight title and emerge with three knockout victories, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a UFC 313 main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev on March 9. A Russian powerhouse who is unbeaten for over six years, Ankalaev will now try to decipher the puzzle presented by Poatan, one of the most dominant champions in the world. Plus, high-level action is guaranteed when lightweights Justin Gaethje and Dan Hooker meet in a highly anticipated co-main event.
